definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="RandomTick">RandomTick</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:RandomTick</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:RandomTick</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">75</field><comment pinned="true" h="80" w="160">Grow Percentage in one tick is 0.075%
Grow Percentage on 1 second is 1.5,(20ticks)</comment></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_add"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Ihillleavefruited</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
